Package com.noelios.restlet.util

Various utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Model Readable and writable model .
ReadableModel Readable model that can be used by the template engine.
WritableModel Writable template model.
 

Class Summary
ByteUtils Byte manipulation utilities.
DefaultModel Default template model implementation.
LogFileHandler Log file handler that uses the com.noelios.restlet.util.LogFormatter by default.
LogFormatter Log record formatter which only outputs the message on a new line.
PipeStream Pipe stream that pipes output streams into input streams.
RestletCallModel Wraps a restlet call into a readable model that can be passed to the string template.
RestletTarget Represents a restlet target for maplet or chainlet attachments.
StringTemplate String template that enforces a strict separation between the template pattern and the template model.
StringUtils String manipulation utilities.
 

Package com.noelios.restlet.util Description

Various utilities.

Since:
1.0
